entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: The current occupant of the White House wants to talk about Bubba.  Instead, here is a quick reminder that DONALD TRUMP IS LETTING THE RUSSIANS KILL AMERICAN SOLDIERS AND LETTING CORONAVIRUS KILL AMERICANS.  HE DOES NOT WANT YOU TO TALK ABOUT THIS.   Please, do not RT!!!!!
